doc.name: iphoneReachabilityTarget
doc.summary: Returns the server currently being monitored

description.overview: Use the iphoneReachabilityTarget function to determine the server currently being monitored for network connectivity.
description.value: The server currently being monitored, empty if no server is currently being monitored.
description.comments: The iphoneReachabilityTarget function returns the server currently being monitored for network connectivity. If there is no server being monitored the function returns empty.
